metadata.title: CVE-2022-2400 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
External Control of File Name or Path in GitHub repository dompdf/dompdfprior to 2.0.0.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2400` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-dompdf - 0.6.2+dfsg-3ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: php-dompdf package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.2+dfsg-3ubuntu0.18.04.1~esm1').
icingaweb2 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
civicrm package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
